page.title: 18JOBS
page.content:
My Dad is a{transport manager}for a small timber company and travels 11 miles to work each day (including crossing the River Severn).
My Dad works as a{freelance architect. We live in the village here in the countryside but he has been workingin Birmingham and Scotland recently and now is designing for a house at Wellington near Telford Shropshire. My Dad is a{Sales Manager}for a firm making huge industrial doors. He travels to Romford,
Out of our Upper Junior class of 22 children 18 parents travel out side the area to work, although 4 of those jobs are part time.{NOTE: farming}only provides employment for the family in almost every case.{See farming page.
